title: The Spacebunny Experience
author: VD
content_html:
The dogs always sit next to Spacebunny. Always. Of course, so do the horses, goats, birds, and random forest animals. It’s basically like that scene from Cinderella, only every day and all the time. At this point, I’ve concluded that she’s some sort of Nordic dryad.

DISCUSS ON SG
